channel.title: How i make all off varrock a pk area?
channel.description:
Okay i got phonescape server but it aint got no wildy in varrock like a pimpscape server
So is there any way i can get it all wildy just like pimpscape
Please help!

item.title: How i make all off varrock a pk area?
item.dc:creator: @Pking_Dragon Pking Dragon
item.source: How i make all off varrock a pk area?

item.title: How i make all off varrock a pk area?
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

Make it look like

public void checkwildy()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 0))
{
inwildy = true;
}
else
{
inwildy = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 0))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
}

then search

public boolean nonWild()

and make it look like

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3257 && absY >= 3431 && absY <= 3439 ) || (absX >= 3257 && absX <= 3260 && absY >= 3435 && absY <= 3437 ) || (absX >= 2675 && absX <= 2677 && absY >= 3420 && absY <= 3429 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3439 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3121 && absY >= 3919 && absY <= 3945 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 )|| 
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

If you dont have

public boolean nonWild()

it should be all wild.

Read full topic
